Summary: it looked like a dragonfly with light blue and light pink lights and changed shape
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in between places to stay..i was sleeping on my jobsight in the back of my ford f350 econoline window van.looking at the sky from the san bernardino mountains at 7,000 feet was simply breath taking.im from the east coast and never seen the stars so close.i dont drink or do any drugs iwas 100 % sober and awake.at about 10:00 pm i saw a strange star like object in the sky..im not familliar with the geogrsphical locations of the area....so at my best guess id have to say it was over the high desert maybe victorville,ca. while watching the object i noticed it changing shape from a star like shape to a bigger ring like shape.(kind of like an eclipse),then it would change into like a dragonfly shape with four wings and a cigar shaped body,there was light blue,light pink,and bright white pulsating lights moving around the object in a counter clockwise direction.....it would move across the sky faster than anthing ive ever seen.faster than a shooting star.so fast it almost seemed to disapear and reapear again.before it would zip accross the sky. it changed from a dragonfly shape into a ring like shape and then into a star like shape before zipping into a new location.when i looked directly at it it seemed like it was blurry..couldnt quite see it perfectly.it almost seemed like it was dancing in the sky...id say like a misquito dancing over a body of water.just barely touching the water just to bounce up again....without any definate pattern..i watched it zip across te sky and change its shape for an hour...at least.....from where i was i had a great view of the skies of southern california,i could see as far as catalina island...the lights of l.a..the high desert.most of san bernardino.watching in the sky for as long as i was i noticed a pattern of planes flying the exact same route before landing at L.A.X. airportor maybe ontario or maybe even both.every time a plane came into proximaty to the object it would quickly change from a dragonfly shape,to a ring shape and finally into a star shape and stayed still untill the airplane was out of visual range of the object.then it would go back to the dragonfly shape again.about every 10 or 15 minuites it would repeat the same thing..at any rate,i had a verry strong led flashlight with me in my van.i pointed it at the object and turned it on and of repeatedly for about 2 minuites.it definately noticed..it came closer to me. it seemed ike it was loking at me ..it then spread from a dragonfly shape into a ring like shape..as it gat closer it got much bigger.it was like it was almost screaming at me ..the pulsating lights moved faster .and the objects ring shape got bigger then smaller several times.and almost disapeared instantly....im not scared of any man .but ill tell ya at that moment i was verry un easy.it was almost like it was going to strike out at me....but..it just disapeared.im not the only one who saw it.i know of at least 3 more people who did
